name: Feytopia
description: A 400 year old chateau in the French countryside, full of a community of 20-40 artists, musicians, and entrepreneurs. Deep roots to the Embassy in San Francisco.

name: Solaris
description: A collective of 5 houses running together as one. Made up of a highly intentional group of friends in tech, exploring authentic community and connection.

name: Incepto
description: A startup-dominated house of 5-10 people. Very cozy and chill, and 10-minute bike ride to Stanford campus.

name: Archive
description: Values curiosity, reliability, intentionality, and benevolence. Composed of a group of extremely diverse residents.

name: Topos
description: A community of scientists dedicated to life-long learning. Lots of scientific minds who are excited about the humanities.

name: Rainbow Mansion
description: A community house full of aspiring astronauts, virtual reality engineers, makers, entrepreneurs, Antarctica explorers, and most importantly, friends.
